publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3144 Tommy Sheridan: Glasgow Housing Association and European Commission Rules—That the Parliament expresses its concern that the transfer of Glasgow council housing to the Glasgow Housing Association may breach European Commission rules on state aid; notes the inadequate answers given so far on this matter by the Scottish Executive, and calls for an early ministerial statement on the issue.

S1M-3144 Tommy Sheridan: Glasgow Housing Association and European Commission Rules—That the Parliament expresses its concern that the transfer of Glasgow council housing to the Glasgow Housing Association may breach European Commission rules on state aid; notes the inadequate answers given so far on this matter by the Scottish Executive, and calls for an early ministerial statement on the issue.
